Type.Name: ISymbolReader

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolReader

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The interface provides access to documents, methods, and variables.

block.para: This interface is the managed counterpart of the ISymUnmanagedReader interface, one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternative way to read and write debug symbol information.

summary.para: Represents a symbol reader for managed code.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument GetDocument (string url, Guid language, Guid languageVendor, Guid documentType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument GetDocument(string url, valuetype System.Guid language, valuetype System.Guid languageVendor, valuetype System.Guid documentType) cil managed

summary.para: Gets a document specified by the language, vendor, and type.

Docs.param: The URL that identifies the document.
The document language. You can specify this parameter as .
The identity of the vendor for the document language. You can specify this parameter as .
The type of the document. You can specify this parameter as .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] GetDocuments ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] GetDocuments() cil managed

summary.para: Gets an array of all documents defined in the symbol store.

returns.para: An array of all documents defined in the symbol store.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolVariable[] GetGlobalVariables ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolVariable[] GetGlobalVariables() cil managed

summary.para: Gets all global variables in the module.

returns.para: An array of all variables in the module.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod GetMethod (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod GetMethod(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method) cil managed

summary.para: Gets a symbol reader method object when given the identifier of a method.

returns.para: The symbol reader method object for the specified method identifier.

Docs.param: The metadata token of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod GetMethod (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method, int version);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod GetMethod(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken method, int32 version) cil managed

summary.para: Gets a symbol reader method object when given the identifier of a method and its edit and continue version.

returns.para: The symbol reader method object for the specified method identifier.

Docs.param: The metadata token of the method.
The edit and continue version of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod GetMethodFromDocumentPosition (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument document, int line, int column);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod GetMethodFromDocumentPosition(class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument document, int32 line, int32 column) cil managed

summary.para: Gets a symbol reader method object that contains a specified position in a document.

returns.para: The reader method object for the specified position in the document.

Docs.param: The document in which the method is located.
The position of the line within the document. The lines are numbered, beginning with 1.
The position of column within the document. The columns are numbered, beginning with 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolNamespace[] GetNamespaces ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolNamespace[] GetNamespaces() cil managed

summary.para: Gets the namespaces that are defined in the global scope within the current symbol store.

returns.para: The namespaces defined in the global scope within the current symbol store.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] GetSymAttribute (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken parent, string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetSymAttribute(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken parent, string name) cil managed

remarks.para: This attribute is only associated with symbolic information and is not a metadata custom attribute.

summary.para: Gets an attribute value when given the attribute name.

Docs.param: The metadata token for the object for which the attribute is requested.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolVariable[] GetVariables (System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken parent);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolVariable[] GetVariables(valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken parent) cil managed

summary.para: Gets the variables that are not local when given the parent.

returns.para: An array of variables for the parent.

Docs.param: The metadata token for the type for which the variables are requested.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken UserEntryPoint { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymbolToken UserEntryPoint

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'SymbolToken'

remarks.para: This is normally your main method, rather than compiler-generated stubs before the main method.

summary.para: Gets the metadata token for the method that was specified as the user entry point for the module, if any.
